name: Slime Ranger Version 0.01
description:
"You the Hero awake on a field and all you see is an army of slimes making their jelly way to you, for now you must hop over them to stay alive until your inexperienced creator makes you a sword, a health bar, and a more rewarding score system."

Okay so I just started coding/programming/developing exactly one week ago and the more I hop into this the more I realize I don't know anything and that the more I do the more I get out of it. I am having an incredibly fun time and I am honestly gratified and amazed this is what I came up with in one week. Now that my youthful optimism is out of the way... Yes the game is super lame, all you do is hop over enemies and if you touch them the game resets. I absolutely had to publish this version though because I wanted myself and the world to have a point of reference. I also am including my coding journal file in the folder, it's like my mental state and thought process during the time I spent coding.

Please be nice because I have a fragile feelings.
